attributes.action: bring back quality tv on a Saturday night and not encourage the creation of any more copy-cat Reality tv/ talent shows!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What happened to Noels House party, The Generation game and other quality Prime Time shows? Lets Bring back the programmes that put the 'Light hearted' into Light Entertainment and put a stop to the endless regeneration of the 'wannabe culture' of talent shows and reality tv!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
